mapper.select: select * from cafe order by cafe_code
select * from cafe where cafe_name like concat('%',#{cafe_name},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into cafe (cafe_code, cafe_name, cafe_addr, cafe_tel, cafe_img) values (#{cafe_code}, #{cafe_name}, #{cafe_addr}, #{cafe_tel}, #{cafe_img})
mapper.update: UPDATE cafe SET cafe_name = #{cafe_name}, cafe_addr = #{cafe_addr}, cafe_tel = #{cafe_tel} WHERE cafe_code = #{cafe_code}
update cafe set cafe_star=#{cafe_star} where cafe_code=#{cafe_code}
